data.name: Project OPERATOR
data.detailed_description:
It's an investigation game where the player embodies an ███'s operator whose mission is to assist field agents by analyzing proofs and making deductions via the computer. He will participate in several cases not linked to each other. Unless…

Inspired by X-Files, Her Story and Return of the Obra Dinn, this project is made of plot twists and various original situations.

How does it work?
You will wake up every morning and go to work. Agents will contact you via your computer and ask you to help them in their cases. You will check the case files and tr to find a solution to their problems thanks to all the tools available such as databases, video analysis, face recognition and many more.

data.short_description: Play an operator and assist field agents by analyzing proofs and making deductions via your computer. You will solve several cases not linked to each other. Unless…
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel iris Xe
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
